column5: Can't find my portable flasher, needing to buy a new one. Looking at the new Eagle 480. Any comments or suggestions would be great. Thanks Joe
I have one on my 14 foot boat and I like it. From what I have read it is probably one of the best buys out there. :cheers:
I have an Eagle 480, and am very pleased with it.
see if you can find a Vexilar Boundary Waters - very nice unit - lite and compact - good marks and archs - runs on AA batts - check it out I've had all kinds and really like this one.
